description: Take sum of squares of digits of previous term.
comments: Essentially the same as A080709. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 24 2009
references: R. Honsberger, Ingenuity in Math., Random House, 1970, p. 83.
A. Porges, A set of eight numbers, Amer. Math. Monthly, 52 (1945), 379-382.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
formula: Ultimately periodic with period 8.a(n)=A080709(n) for n>4. - _M. F. Hasler_, May 24 2009a(n+1) = A003132(a(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 19 2011
